page.title: 03CHILDREN'S GAMES AT SCHOOL
page.content: { {1915 In the football season they played football in the field behind the school. They went up to Mr. White's and killed as many mice as they could. They played Fox and Hounds:- one person hid and the others tried to find him. They played Tipcat which was hitting a sharp bit of wood on the end with a stick. It flew in the air and you tried to hit it. They played with hoops,tops and conkers. { {1925 They played hopscotch and with tops and hoops. { {1945 They played skipping and hopscotch. They didn't have toys like we have. There was a shortage in wartime.
